articles.title: IGNOU Puts Psychology Programmes on Hold for January 2026 Admission
articles.description: IGNOU has officially put MA Psychology, BA Psychology and PG Diploma in Mental Health on hold for the January 2026 admission cycle. Fees will be refunded to applicants.

articles.title: President Murmu Inaugurates IGNOU Regional Skill Centre in Odisha
articles.description: President Droupadi Murmu inaugurated a new IGNOU Regional Skill Centre in Odisha to promote skill-based education.

articles.title: IGNOU Launches New Skill Courses 2026
articles.description: IGNOU announced new job-oriented skill courses for the 2026 admission cycle.

articles.title: IGNOU Job Fair 2026: Big Opportunity for IGNOU Students
articles.description: IGNOU has announced Job Fair / Placement Drive 2026 for UG & PG students.
